introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is AI Image Detector
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: AI Image Detector uses advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze images and identify whether they were generated by artificial intelligence or created by humans.

items.title: Instant Detection
items.description: Upload any image and get results in seconds with our real-time AI analysis technology.

items.title: Advanced Algorithms
items.description: Uses state-of-the-art machine learning models trained on millions of images for accurate detection.

items.title: Privacy First
items.description: Your uploaded images are processed securely and never stored on our servers.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose AI Image Detector
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Protect yourself and your organization from AI-generated image fraud with our industry-leading detection technology.

items.title: Combat Fake News
items.description: Identify AI-generated images used in misinformation campaigns and protect against fake news propaganda.

items.title: Prevent Art Theft
items.description: Detect unauthorized AI reproductions of original artwork and protect intellectual property rights.

items.title: Stop Identity Fraud
items.description: Identify deepfake profile pictures and AI-generated identity documents to prevent fraud and scams.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Detect AI Images
usage.description: Identify AI-generated images in three simple steps:

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Drag and drop any image file or paste an image URL. Supports JPG, PNG, and other common formats.

items.title: AI Analysis
items.description: Our advanced algorithms analyze the image for telltale signs of AI generation in seconds.

items.title: Get Results
items.description: Receive a confidence score and detailed analysis showing why the image was flagged as AI or human-created.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About AI Image Detector
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email or check our documentation.

items.title: How accurate is the AI image detection?
items.description: Our AI Image Detector achieves over 95% accuracy in identifying AI-generated images. The system is trained on millions of images and continuously updated to detect the latest AI generation techniques.

items.title: What types of AI-generated images can it detect?
items.description: We can detect images created by popular AI tools including DALL-E, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, and many others. Our algorithms identify common artifacts and patterns specific to AI generation.

items.title: Is my uploaded image data stored or shared?
items.description: No, we prioritize your privacy. Uploaded images are processed in real-time and immediately deleted after analysis. We never store, share, or use your images for any other purpose.

items.title: What file formats and sizes are supported?
items.description: We support JPG, PNG, GIF, and WebP formats up to 8MB in size with a maximum resolution of 10,000x10,000 pixels. Screenshots may reduce detection accuracy.

items.title: Can I integrate this into my application?
items.description: Yes! We offer a RESTful API that allows you to integrate AI image detection into your applications, websites, or workflows. Check our API documentation for implementation details.

items.title: What should I do if I get an incorrect result?
items.description: While our system is highly accurate, no detection method is 100% perfect. We're currently in BETA and continuously improving. You can report incorrect results to help us enhance our algorithms.
